setaudit.description: When used, will set the current channel as the audit channel (used for recording moderation actions and server updates). Append `-disable` to disable this feature.

help.description: Shows you this menu... or does it?

editaudit.description:
Let's you enable/disable recorded actions in the audit channel. Use the list below for the action names.

`memberJoin`,`memberLeave`,`channelCreate`,`channelDelete`,`roleCreate`,`roleDelete`,`memberBanned`,`memberUnbannned`,`vcCreate`,`vcDelete`,`msgDelete`,`serverUpdate`,`memberUpdate`,`channelUpdate`,`pinsUpdate`,`roleUpdate`,`msgUpdate`,`emojiUpdate`,`reactionRemoveAll`

level.description: Sends an info card about your level, how many messages you've sent, and how many you've sent in the server.

setwelcome.description: I don't have anything on this command yet, sorry :(
